TopicTitle: [0.21][Parts Pack]Deep Space Mission Pack - Now open source!

Articles.Content:
Uh... how do I install this pack? I am not able due to spaceport....

It's for an older version of the game. Version 0.21. I am certain it won't work with 0.24.x

Developer of this mod,

THANK YOU

Thank you for not taking down this mod because thanks to you, I could restore a lot of my old career from 0.22 and feel some warmth in my heart, seeing my first and silly projects. You've brought back something that is very special to me and for that you have my gratitude!

Have an amazing day!

It's for an older version of the game. Version 0.21. I am certain it won't work with 0.24.x

Why not? This is a parts pack it probably needs to be added to the tech tree and needs a pricing pass but only plugins should be broken by updates.
I really miss this...

It works fine in sandbox. As stated above, there are no plugin dependencies, so there should be no problems with the parts working in the game, I still use some of them. The 'look' is a bit dated on the reactors and engines and stuff, but otherwise everything is hunky-dory for me.

The only thing that should be necessary is a few modifications to the configs to add tech-tree, science, and cost data so that the parts will work in all career modes.
Cant find this on Curse, is is available anywhere?

Cant find this on Curse, is is available anywhere?

Hello bjbeardse, you can download this mod from Mediafire and Dropbox from the OP(original post), under the mirror part of the post.

Edited August 10, 2014 by joker169

Wait, so this works in 0.24? Sweet! Though really, someone should make a tech-tree integration patch and cost rebalance.

(Sorry to bump!)

Wait, so this works in 0.24? Sweet! Though really, someone should make a tech-tree integration patch and cost rebalance.

(Sorry to bump!)

It might take a little thread perusing, but there is tech tree integration, though they very probably need a cost rebalance.
As requested I updated the license and also made it open source, so anyone thinking about updating it for further use go ahead!

As requested I updated the license and also made it open source, so anyone thinking about updating it for further use go ahead!

You are amazing! Thank you so much for this.
I think the textures should be redone. They seem a bit...obsolete. Great models though.
I'm trying to get this configured for 24.2 I have all the files, does anyone have them arranged so the whole thing works properly?
Check out this post for install instructions, Also, check your GameData folder for a nested GameData folder (Basically one is inside the other)

Check out this post for install instructions, Also, check your GameData folder for a nested GameData folder (Basically one is inside the other)

I followed the instructions of that post, but the parts still don't show up. I'm not sure what I'm doing wrong. I'd like to find something that has the files already properly prepped, because clearly I'm missing something critical (and probably simple).
Never mind, the front page works just fine.
Anyone know how much trouble it'd be to put a proper hatch on the command pods so you can go EVA without a lot of hassle?
I assume this mod has died out?

Can someone please update the main spherical pod for 1.0?

I hate to just make a request without any kind of incentive... but I love that pod and I want to be able to do proper missions with it. (It needs an EVA hatch too).

I'm terrible with making mods, not bad with tweaking a mod that's close.

Can anyone help me?
I've got the sphere pod working in 1.0, but it could still use an EVA hatch. Anyone know how to add one?
